Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. For this exceptional opportunity, I propose a price of $15000. This amount reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we place on providing top-tier solutions to our esteemed clients. I look forward to your consideration and hope to see this product contribute positively to your endeavors. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
